description: This Thai curry is extra green with lots of fragrant herbs, spices and veggies.
name: Spicy Thai Green Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients for the sauce with half a bunch of coriander (including stalks) and half the spinach to a blender and blitz until smooth and vibrant green in colour.
Heat the oil in a large, deep pan on a medium high heat and add the chicken. Cook for 34 minutes then add the spring onions and green beans and cook for 3 more minutes.

Pour over the sauce and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas and spinach and cook for 5 more minutes, until the vegetables have softened, the sauce has thickened slightly and the chicken is cooked through.
Serve with the remaining fresh coriander scattered on top and brown rice.
